promptImprover.modelVendor.description: Select which language model vendor to use for prompt improvement

enumDescriptions: GPT-4o - Latest and most capable model (recommended)
GPT-4o Mini - Faster, lightweight version of GPT-4o
GPT-4 Turbo - Previous generation high-capability model
GPT-3.5 Turbo - Fast and efficient for simpler tasks
Claude 3.5 Sonnet - Anthropic's latest model (if available)
Default - Use the default model selected by the provider
promptImprover.modelFamily.description: Select which model to use for prompt improvement. Different models offer different capabilities and speeds.

enumDescriptions: General improvement - Balanced approach for any coding prompt
Context-aware - Leverages workspace context (languages, frameworks, open files)
Concise - Quick improvements with minimal overhead
Custom - Edit the 'System Prompt' setting below to define your own
promptImprover.systemPromptPreset.description: Choose a preset system prompt or use 'custom' to define your own

promptImprover.systemPrompt.markdownDescription:
**Current System Prompt** - View or edit the prompt used for improvements.

This field displays the active preset's content. When you make changes here, the preset will automatically switch to 'custom'.

**Available placeholders:**
- `{userPrompt}` - The user's original prompt
- `{languages}` - Detected programming languages
- `{technologies}` - Detected frameworks/technologies
- `{openFiles}` - Currently open files

promptImprover.customSystemPrompt.markdownDescription: ⚠️ **Internal use only** - This stores your custom prompt when using the 'custom' preset. Edit the 'System Prompt' field above instead.
